trans-unit.source: Creates an arbitrary affine matrix transformation that is used to manipulate objects or coordinate systems in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] plane.
trans-unit.target: 建立用來操作物件或座標系統中的任意仿射矩陣轉換[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)]平面。

trans-unit.source: Use the MatrixTransform class to create custom transformations that are not provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.SkewTransform>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform> classes.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立自訂的轉換不提供使用 MatrixTransform 類別<xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.SkewTransform>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform> </xref:System.Windows.Media.SkewTransform> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform>

trans-unit.source: A 3x3 matrix is used for transformations in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] x-y plane.
trans-unit.target: 3x3 矩陣用於中的轉換[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)]x，y 平面。

trans-unit.source: You can multiply affine matrix transformations to form linear transformations, such as rotation and skew (shear) that are followed by translation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將仿射矩陣轉換，形成線性轉換，例如旋轉及傾斜 （切變） 緊接著轉譯。

trans-unit.source: An affine matrix transformation has its final column equal to (0, 0, 1); therefore, you only have to specify the members in the first two columns.
trans-unit.target: 仿射矩陣轉換具有其最後一個資料行等於 （0，0，1）;因此，您只需要前兩個資料行中指定的成員。

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix> has the following structure: |||| |-|-|-| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M11%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M12%2A>|0| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M21%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M22%2A>|0| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY%2A>|1| The members in the last row, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY%2A>, represent translation values.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>具有下列結構: | | | |-|-|-| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M11%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M12%2A>|0| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M21%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M22%2A>|0| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY%2A>|1| 在最後一個資料列中，成員<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY%2A>，代表轉譯的值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.OffsetX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M22%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M21%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M12%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix.M11%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Matrix>

trans-unit.source: Methods and properties usually specify the transformation matrix as a vector that has only six members; the members are as follows: (, , , , , ) ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values *m11* The value at position (1, 1) of the transformation .
trans-unit.target: 方法和屬性通常會轉換矩陣，可指定為的向量，只有六個成員;成員是，如下所示: (， ， ， ， ， ) # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` - or - ``` # # XAML 值*m11* 位於.轉換的位置 （1，1） 的值

trans-unit.source: *m12* <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName> The value at position (1, 2) of the transformation <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *m12* <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>位於<xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>轉換的位置 （1，2） 的值</xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: *m21* <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName> The value at position (2, 1) of the transformation <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *m21* <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>位於<xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>轉換的位置 （2，1） 的值</xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: *m22* <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName> The value at position (2, 2) of the transformation <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *m22* <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>位於<xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>轉換的位置 （2，2） 的值</xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: *offsetX* <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName> The value at position (3, 1) of the transformation <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *offsetX* <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>位於<xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>轉換的位置 （3，1） 的值</xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: *offsetY* <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName> The value at position (3, 2) of the transformation <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *offsetY* <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>位於<xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>轉換的位置 （3，2） 的值</xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform"></xref> class with the specified transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform"></xref>與指定的轉換矩陣的類別。

trans-unit.source: The transformation matrix of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新的轉換矩陣<xref href="System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform"></xref> class with the specified transformation matrix values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform"></xref>類別指定的轉換矩陣的值。

trans-unit.source: The value at position (1, 1) in the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 在轉換矩陣中的位置 （1，1） 的值。

trans-unit.source: The value at position (1, 2) in the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 在轉換矩陣中的位置 （1，2） 的值。

trans-unit.source: The value at position (2, 1) in the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 在轉換矩陣中的位置 （2，1） 的值。

trans-unit.source: The value at position (2, 2) in the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 在轉換矩陣中的位置 （2，2） 的值。

trans-unit.source: The X-axis translation factor, which is located at position (3,1) in the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: X 軸轉譯因素，是在位置 (3,1) 中的轉換矩陣。

trans-unit.source: The Y-axis translation factor, which is located at position (3,2) in the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: Y 軸轉譯因素，是在位置 (3,2) 中的轉換矩陣。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform"></xref> by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: 建立的可修改的複本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform"></xref>藉由其值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來產生可修改複本的唯讀<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings although they might no longer resolve.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法會複製相依性屬性時，會複製資源參考和資料繫結，但可能已不能再解析也一樣。

trans-unit.source: It does not copy animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 它不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改深層複本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: <> </> *> 複製物件的屬性會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使<> *> 的來源屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform"></xref> object by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: 建立的可修改的複本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform"></xref>物件藉由其值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, or animations, although it does copy their current values.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結或動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來產生可修改複本的唯讀<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改深層複本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <> </> *> 複製物件的屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使<> *> 的來源屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> structure that defines this transformation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>定義此轉換的結構。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref> structure that defines this transformation.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref>定義此轉換的結構。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an identity <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是身分識別<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Matrix"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An identity matrix has a value of `1` in coefficients `[1,1]`, `[2,2]`, and `[3,3]`; and a value of `0` in the rest of the coefficients.
trans-unit.target: 身分識別矩陣的值為`1`在係數`[1,1]`， `[2,2]`，和`[3,3]`; 而值為`0`係數的其餘部分。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix*> that represents this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix*>，這代表<xref href="System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix*>

trans-unit.source: To modify the matrix of this transform, use its <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要修改這個轉換的矩陣，請使用其<xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A>

trans-unit.source: The matrix that represents this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示這個矩陣<xref href="System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform"> </xref>。
